code: import io from'socket.io';var socket=io();function subscribeToShowRooms(cb){socket.on('showRooms',function(room){return cb(null,room);});}function clearSocket(){socket.removeAllListeners();}function getRooms(cb2){console.log('getRoomsCalled');socket.emit('getRooms');socket.on('updateRooms',function(room){return cb2(null,room);});}function checkRoomCreation(){socket.emit('checkRoomCreation');}function joinRoom(playerId){socket.emit('joinRoom',playerId);}export{subscribeToShowRooms,clearSocket,getRooms,socket,joinRoom};
